metadata.title: CVE-2022-41556 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A resource leak in gw_backend.c in lighttpd 1.4.56 through 1.4.66 couldlead to a denial of service (connection-slot exhaustion) after a largeamount of anomalous TCP behavior by clients. It is related to RDHUPmishandling in certain HTTP/1.1 chunked situations. Use of mod_fastcgi is,for example, affected. This is fixed in 1.4.67.

criterions.comment: lighttpd package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
